trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.

In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.

The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.

The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.

- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.

The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.

- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.

The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.

The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.

The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.

The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
The designer for the data source of the associated control.
Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
A <xref:System.String> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.

The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.

If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.

If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.

The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
It finally calls the Dispose base method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.

The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that is used as a template for the data format.
The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.

An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> of the associated control, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
Gets the data source component from the associated control container.

The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.

An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property of the associated control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
Gets the data source of the template's container.

The GetTemplateContainerDataSource method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing a design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
The Initialize connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the Initialize connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
Invokes a component editor for the associated control.

The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.

The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
Called when there is a change to the associated control.

The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.

It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.

For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable the events.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> object.
